# expirationIntent

**Type**

The reason an auto-renewable subscription expired.

## Declaration

```swift
int32 expirationIntent
```

## Subscription renewal and expiration

- **autoRenewStatus**: The renewal status for an auto-renewable subscription.
- **autoRenewProductId**: The identifier of the product that renews at the next billing period.
- **expiresDate**: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, an auto-renewable subscription purchase expires or renews.
- **isUpgraded**: The Boolean value that indicates whether the customer upgraded to another subscription.
- **renewalDate**: The UNIX time, in milliseconds, when the most recent auto-renewable subscription purchase expires.
- **renewalPrice**: The renewal price, in milliunits, of the auto-renewable subscription that renews at the next billing period.
- **status**: The status of an auto-renewable subscription.
